description: This file defines a Lightning.js component named 'Home' that includes a template with animated elements, a state object, lifecycle hooks, and methods. It imports other components and external modules to construct a UI page.

classes.name: Home
classes.description: A Lightning.js component representing the Home page with animated logo, loader, and button.

methods.name: rotateColors
methods.description: Cycles through a predefined set of colors, updating the component's color property at specified intervals.
